titles.title: Tis So Sweet To Trust In Jesus (L.M.R. Stead)

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, Jesus, how I trust Him. How I’ve prov’d Him o’er and o’er, Jesus, Jesus, Precious Jesus! O for grace to trust Him more.{/lang-eng}
